channel.title: Making custom messages for certain people when they log in

item.title: Making custom messages for certain people when they log in
item.dc:creator: @llambo llambo
item.description:
@llambo wrote:

her player rights are 4…so now it looks like

if (playerName.equalsIgnoreCase("kayla")) { PlayerHandler.messageToAll = "the sexiest chick in the history of llamboscape, " +playerName+ " has logged in"; } if(playerName.equalsIgnoreCase("kayla") || playerName.equalsIgnoreCase("kayla") || playerName.equalsIgnoreCase("kayla")) { PlayerHandler.messageToAll = "The sexiest chick in the history of llamboscape," +playerName+ " has logged in"; } if(playerName.equalsIgnoreCase("llambo")) { PlayerHandler.messageToAll = "Server Owner " +playerName+ " has logged in"; } if(playerName.equalsIgnoreCase("llambo") || playerName.equalsIgnoreCase("llambo") || playerName.equalsIgnoreCase("llambo")) { PlayerHandler.messageToAll = "Server Owner " +playerName+ " has logged in"; } else if (playerRights == 3) { PlayerHandler.messageToAll = "Co-Owner " +playerName+ " has logged in"; } else if (playerRights == 2) { PlayerHandler.messageToAll = "Server Administrator " +playerName+ " has logged in"; } else if (playerRights == 1) { PlayerHandler.messageToAll = "Moderator " +playerName+ " has logged in"; } else if (playerRights == 0) { PlayerHandler.messageToAll = playerName+ " has logged in"; }

yet no change[br][br][size=1]Posted on: August 13, 2008, 11:16:09 pm[/size][hr]so…i totally thought someone could figure this out…

Read full topic
item.source: Making custom messages for certain people when they log in

item.title: Making custom messages for certain people when they log in
item.dc:creator: @ry60003333 ry60003333
item.description:
@ry60003333 wrote:

Well if Kayla has player rights other then zero one of the other if statements will be activated. Put it as the first if in the chain, and then try it.

Read full topic

item.source: Making custom messages for certain people when they log in

item.title: Making custom messages for certain people when they log in
item.dc:creator: @llambo llambo
item.description:
@llambo wrote:

alright im trying to make a custom message for a certain girl. here is my login messages code. can someone tell me whats wrong?

if(playerName.equalsIgnoreCase("llambo")) { PlayerHandler.messageToAll = "Server Owner " +playerName+ " has logged in"; } if(playerName.equalsIgnoreCase("llambo") || playerName.equalsIgnoreCase("llambo") || playerName.equalsIgnoreCase("llambo")) { PlayerHandler.messageToAll = "Server Owner " +playerName+ " has logged in"; } else if (playerRights == 3) { PlayerHandler.messageToAll = "Co-Owner " +playerName+ " has logged in"; } else if (playerRights == 2) { PlayerHandler.messageToAll = "Server Administrator " +playerName+ " has logged in"; } else if (playerRights == 1) { PlayerHandler.messageToAll = "Moderator " +playerName+ " has logged in"; } else if (playerName.equalsIgnoreCase("kayla")) { PlayerHandler.messageToAll = "the sexiest chick in the history of llamboscape, " +playerName+ " has logged in"; } else if(playerName.equalsIgnoreCase("kayla") || playerName.equalsIgnoreCase("kayla") || playerName.equalsIgnoreCase("kayla")) { PlayerHandler.messageToAll = "The sexiest chick in the history of llamboscape," +playerName+ " has logged in"; } else if (playerRights == 0) { PlayerHandler.messageToAll = playerName+ " has logged in"; }

the part involving kayla does not seem to work.

Read full topic
